item.title: Relation d’un voyage d’exploration au nord-est de la Colonie du Cape de Bonne-Espérance, entrepris dans le mois de mars, avril et mai 1836 par Mm
item.scopeAndContent:
[Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of Arbousset, Thomas, Relation d’un voyage d’exploration au nord-est de la Colonie du Cape de Bonne-Espérance, entrepris dans le mois de mars, avril et mai 1836 par Mm. T. Arbousset et F. Daumas. Paris: Arthus Bertrand, 1842.]
[Source - Ettore Morelli for FHYA, 2020: A digitised copy of the book published by the French missionary Thomas Arbousset in 1842, covering the travels he and François Daumas undertook in 1836 in the regions surrounding the Caledon Valley, in modern Lesotho and Free State Province. The book was first published in French. This edition contains lithographies and a map; this digital copy does not include the map and some pages are missing. No complete copy has been found online yet.]
